metadata.name: Loan Repayment Period
metadata.description: CRS Loan Repayment No of Payments

1.name: Annual
1.description: The loan has 1 repayment per year

2.name: Semi-annual
2.description: The loan has 2 repayments per year

4.name: Quarterly
4.description: The loan has 4 repayments per year

12.name: Monthly
12.description: The loan has 12, monthly repayments per year
